page.title: 09LETWELL PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: Our area is in two{counties South {Yorkshire }and {Nottinghamshire.South {Yorkshire County Council}is governed by{Rotherham}and{Nottinghamshire {County Council}is governed by Nottingham. 75% of our area is in Nottinghamshire.{Letwell }has a small Parish Council of four people,Rev Liddle,Mr Woodward,Mr Sharp and Mrs Needham.The meetings are every Wednesday at about 8.00pm and can last up to two hours.The{Parish Council {talk about Letwell}and how they can improve the small{village.}The {Parish {Council}also decide whether{Letwell {will have any activities}which the public can go to.The reports of the meeting will go to{Rotherham. Carlton {has a bigger Parish Council}than Letwell.The reports of a{Carlton {Parish Council}will go to{Nottingham. {Wallingwells}hasn't a{Parish Council.
